description:
Break this out at camp to let people know you mean business about food. It’s got kitchen luxuries to flip pancakes and grate parmesan, along with sensible things like a knife, spoon and fork. The whole set wraps up, which means no loose items floating in your camping kit.

  • Includes stainless steel knife, stainless steel micro-grater, oak spatula, oak spoon and oak fork
  • Knife has a flexible 12cm blade
  • Poly-cotton roll is coated so you can wipe it clean
  • Roll can hang or lay flat, and has a pocket to bring along extras
name: Primus Campfire Prep Set
